title: Companion Approval Guide
content: /s: Ask Astarion to go on stage Jaheira + Astarion - Dribbles the Clown Circus of the Last Days - You can find Dribbles the Clown performing on stage for a crowd on the northern side of the Circus. When Dribbles the Clown asks you to come on stage choose Jaheira instead. Requirement/s: Halsin + N/A Dribbles the Clown Circus of the Last Days - You can find Dribbles the Clown performing on stage for a crowd on the northern side of the Circus. When Dribbles the Clown asks you to come on stage choos
